note.previous: Samaṇe brāhmaṇe cāpi, aññe vāpi vanibbake
Svāhaṃ upagatomhi saccanāmaṃ, anukampassu punapi suṇemu

note.original: ruciratthatā (syā. ka.) 646 gāthāyaṃ ‘‘rucakupakiṇṇaṃ’’ti padassa saṃvaṇṇanā passitabbā

note.previous: pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ
Khattiyo nusi rājañño, adu luddo vanecaro’’ti
Nāmaṃ me bhikkhu te brūmi, sujāto iti maṃ vidū
maṃ tvaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, tameva saraṇaṃ vaja
Brahā mahantā balino mahājavā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare
Samaṃ vahantā mudukā anuddhatā, āmodamānā turagāna
Imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ
Yadā ca gītāni ca vāditāni ca, naccāni cimāni

note.original: nayidaṃ appassa katassa (sī. syā.), sāsedaṃ appakatassa (ka.)
nayimasmiṃ vā loke parasmiṃ (kathāvatthu 799), nayimasmi loke va parasmi (?)

note.previous: aṭṭomhi dukkhena pīḷito, bhikkhu ca taṃ sāmaṃ muñcitvānantakaṃ
Tassa cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahāmi
Svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato’’ti
Yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāma
Daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato ca
Acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyā

note.original: ime sirīsūpavanā ca (sī.), imepi sirīsavanā ca (pī. ka.)

note.previous: Āyukkhayā puññakkhayā cavissaṃ, teneva sokena pamucchitosmī’’ti
